name: donkulous DONKEYS - more ridonkulous than flappy
name_original: donkulous DONKEYS - more ridonkulous than flappy
description:
Unapologetically HARD. Insanely ADDICTIVE. More RETRO than retro.

[ Howto Play ]
> Avoid Donkeys. DUH!
> Tap left/right of screen to change lane.

[ Cheat Tip ]
Tap with 2 or more fingers to jump lanes. Master this & see your score shoot up!

[ Share Replays ]
Showoff your skillz. Tap SHARE to post your gameplay video on Facebook, Twitter, YouTube & Kamcord.

[ Dare Challenge ]
Tap DARE to challenge your Game Center frenz. Accept or forever live in Shame!
